definitions: an attack by an animal causing serious injury

examples.text: increased incidences of grizzly bear maulings

shortDefinitions: attack by animal causing serious injury

examples.text: he faces a mauling at next week's conference

definitions: a heavy defeat in a game or match

examples.text: the mauling they received from the Green Bay Packers

shortDefinitions: heavy defeat in game or match

definitions: (in rugby union) the action of forming a loose scrum around a player with the ball off the ground

examples.text: the forwards' rucking and mauling was exceptional

shortDefinitions: action of forming loose scrum around player with ball off ground
